alert.note: Alert for Brooks; Colquitt; Cook; Thomas (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Cook, Thomas, western Brooks and southeastern Colquitt Counties through 500 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 8 miles east of Moultrie to 6 miles southwest of Thomasville. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Adel, Thomasville, Moultrie, Sparks, Boston, Pavo, Coolidge, Morven, Berlin, Barwick, Ellenton, Reed Bingham State Park, Thomasville Municipal A/P, Grooverville, Massee, Dillon, Greggs, Enon, Everett and Flat Ford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
